quotes.quote: We are now rolling out the Gaza Nakba
quotes.context: Reference to ethnic cleansing (Nakba refers to 1948 Palestinian expulsion)

sources.name: Human Rights Watch - Hopeless, Starving, and Besieged

quotes.quote: Gaza Nakba 2023. That's how it'll end
quotes.context: Confirmation of intent for ethnic cleansing

sources.name: Human Rights Watch - Hopeless, Starving, and Besieged
